contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 1, 1947 D West Riding Contest (2nd Section)
West Riding Contest (2nd Section) 20 Test Piece Contest West Riding Contest west-riding-contest-2nd-section
Echoes of Spring
Canteen, Rowntrees Works, York Original result had Kippax Old 1st, Lee Mount 3rd. Both were disqualified to give this amended result. 10 bands competed.
Dec. 27, 2012, 10:09 a.m. March 1, 2013, 2:11 p.m.
1 Buttersfield's Tank Works Wood Sykes
2 Hammonds Saltaire Herbert Bowdin Hawley
3 Ryhill Silver Unknown
4 Black Dyke Mills Junior Unknown
Disqualified Kippax Band A. Denton
Disqualified Lee Mount J. E. Fletcher
